|cpu1chip1 = Ralink;RT3050;RT3050F; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 320 <!-- 320 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV640ETTI-70G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9825G6JH-61; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink v3.3; |stockos = Linux;2.6.21.7;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;Terminus;FE1.1;LG3S945A6410;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = 8devices Carambola |rad1modif = SIP (on-board) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT3050; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = ARCFlex AFM2 |rad2modif = USB (non-standard connector) |rad2chip1 = Ralink;RT3572; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The FCC IDs for this device are likely Z2B-AFM1 (RT3050 board) and Z2B-AFM2 (RT3572 module). *Dual Radio - 2.4GHz AP (21dBi), 5GHz MIMO CPE (25dBi) w/ 18dBi antenna *802.11bgn (150Mbps), 802.11an (300Mbps), all outdoor enclosure *POE Passthrough up to 24V, polarity independent The same hardware is likely used for the FreeStation 2.
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/arc/freestation On the OpenWrt wiki] :MX29LV640ETTI-70G Flash in the RT3050 board filing. :Assumed A8:87:ED OUI...
Per [http://www.antennas.com/wiki/index.php?title=ARCFlex_Quick_Install_Guides#Default_Settings ARC Wireless' wiki]... *the default SSID is '''arcweb''' (for both radios?) *the default IP is apparently 10.100.100.49 if connected via the installer network or 192.168.10.1 if connected via private wireless or by Ethernet *the default password for the UI and telnet are admin/admin and user/user *PoE input port is eth0, output is eth1 (but PoE passthrough is disabled by default)
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|wassupported}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/arcflex/arcflex_freestation5_v1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/arc_wireless/freestation |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = rt305x |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 12.09 |current_supported_version = 22.03.7 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
